attributes.action: Bar all current MP's from standing for re-election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now that the majority of the current shower of MP's are slowly being exposed as the dishonest, gravy train riding parasites that they are, they should all be barred from seeking re-election.

This would go some way to restore public confidence in future MP's, which would not be the case if the same discredited and tainted collection of thieves and vagabonds were allowed to return to the scene of their crime.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
